```{r}

library(exscidata); library(tidyverse)
data("hypertrophy")
glimpse(hypertrophy)


dat <- hypertrophy %>%
  select(PARTICIPANT, DXA_LBM_T1:DXA_LBM_T3, TESTOSTERONE_T1:TESTOSTERONE_T3) %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(testoavg. = mean(c(TESTOSTERONE_T1, TESTOSTERONE_T2, TESTOSTERONE_T3), na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  
  ungroup() %>%
  
  mutate(DXA_change = DXA_LBM_T3 - DXA_LBM_T1) %>%
  
  group_by() %>%
  mutate(testoavg. = testoavg. - mean(testoavg.)) %>%
  
  select(PARTICIPANT, testoavg., DXA_change) %>%
  
  filter(! is.na(testoavg.)) %>%
  
  #print()
  
  
 #pivot_wider(names_from = variable, 
  #            values_from = value) %>%
  
  #pivot_wider(names_from = time,
  #           values_from = c(DXA, TESTOSTERONE)) %>%
  
  
  
  #pivot_wider()

 # print()


# Fit the model

m1 <- lm(DXA_change ~ testoavg., data = dat)

summary(m1) 




#Reg.

library(broom) 

tidy(m1)
 

#plotte figur

dat %>%
  ggplot(aes(DXA_change, testoavg.)) + geom_point() + theme_minimal() %>%
  abline(lm(DXA_change ~ testoavg.)) %>%
  
  print()
```
